name: King of the Goglis
description:
A game made for the Cork GameCraft 2016 gamejam.

The Theme of the gamejam was "Tiny Games". My idea was to make an open world RPG kind of a game, but on a tiny planet.

Unfortunately I didn't have time to make a boss and a win state in the jam, but I hope to do some more work on the game.

Xbox controller / Keyboard
Left Stick / WASD - Steer Character
A / Left Ctrl - Attack
B / Alt - Reset game
